metadata.title: Erdogan tells Putin Turkey supports Ukraine peace effort

left: Erdoğan stated that Türkiye supports approaches to maintain permanent peace with the participation of all sides and is closely following the peace process.
Erdoğan emphasized Türkiye's sincere efforts for a just peace since the start of the Ukraine war.
President Putin thanked Erdoğan for hosting peace talks and Türkiye’s role in the Istanbul Process.
Both leaders agreed to continue their dialogue to promote peace between Russia and Ukraine.
